PerfectNetExp.abs: a small group of persons stood near ; some were indifferent , and others gazed curiously at the savages . two children peeped from behind their mother's skirts as if half , half-frightened .有些人显得并不在意，而有些人好奇地盯着那些印第安人。两个孩子从他们妈妈裙子的后面探出脑袋半惊半奇地瞧着眼前的印第安人。

I considered it a success when I asked a roomful of middle school boys what they'd see if they looked straight down and they answered ,' Up girls' skirts .我觉得它很成功，因为当我问满屋子的中学生，如果他们直直往下看，会看到什麽时，他们的回答是，可以看到『女生的裙底』。
I like it , too . I always like skirts like this ., 我也喜欢它 . 我一直喜欢像这样飘动的裙子.
Her filthiness clung to her skirts ;, 她的污秽就在她的裙子上;

entry.def: A skirt is a piece of clothing worn by women and girls. It fastens at the waist and hangs down around the legs.

entry.tran: 位于…的边缘;位于…的外围;围绕
entry.def: Something that skirts an area is situated around the edge of it.

example.ex: We raced across a large field that skirted the slope of a hill.
example.tran: 我们从山坡下的一大片田地里飞奔而过。

entry.tran: 沿着…的边缘走;沿着…的外围走;绕着…走
entry.def: If you skirt something, you go around the edge of it.

example.ex: We shall be skirting the island on our way...
She skirted round the edge of the room to the door.
example.tran: 她贴着房间的墙边走到了门口。

entry.def: If you skirt a problem or question, you avoid dealing with it.

example.ex: He skirted the hardest issues, concentrating on areas of possible agreement...
example.tran: 他避开了最棘手的问题，将精力集中于有可能达成一致的领域。

example.ex: He skirted round his main differences with her.
example.tran: 他避开了和她之间的主要分歧。

auth_sentence.content: We all stopped wearing our little heels and skirts.

auth_sentence.content: Lifting her skirts to avoid draggling them in the white dust.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lifting her skirts to avoid draggling them in the white dust.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lifting her skirts to avoid draggling them in the white dust.
